Text.Page:
I know you came back here to help find Elleon, but I'll be blunt: we had a lot of shell-shocked survivors come back here...survivors that should have stayed in their hospital beds.

Don't get me wrong. I want you to find Elleon, but I don't want to someday be trying to find you. We need to make sure you're fully recovered and ready for combat.

Speak with Centurion Barsabba.

If that old warhorse says you're ready for duty, that's good enough for me.

We all want revenge on the demons, but this time we're going to be prepared. No more surprise storms or disastrous beach landings.

You look as healthy as any other . But looks can be deceiving.
